name: RoboArena (itch)
description:
Survive as long as you can

This game was made in a week for the Indie Game Dev Beginners 3 Jam

Controls

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Shoot - Left Mouse

Raise Shield - Right Mouse

Pickup Item - E

Items in game

Laser - A weapon that has high firing rate but low damage per hit, when you hit your target, the firing rate increase, and when you miss your target the firing rate decreases. It's a weapon that reward the player for having consistent accuracy.

B.A.R.G - A weapon that has low firing rate but very high damage per hit, it's best use with a shield so that you can take the time to precisely aim while mitigating damage

Shield - When equipped it will block damage in line of sight until its health depletes, you can hold right mouse button to hold the shield in front.

Health Pack - Restores 40% health upon pickup

Some robots will spawn with items (B.A.R.G, Shield or Health Pack), these items will be dropped when the robots are killed and can be picked up by the player.
